column1: 7 temporarily free and 19 on-sale apps and games for Wednesday

It's another Wednesday, so that means it's time for a round of app sales. Today's list is paltry by some measures, mercifully small by others. Regardless, there isn't much here and, frankly, I considered skipping today. Oh, well, have at it.
Deadly Traps Premium - Adventure of Hell $1.49 -> Free
Sword Knights : Dragon Hunter (idle rpg) $2.49 -> Free
Epic Heroes War: Shadow Lord Stickman - Premium $0.99 -> Free
Sinfonia - Icon Pack for your custom launcher $0.99 -> Free
Sagon Circle Icon Pack: Dark UI $1.49 -> Free
PDF Editor & Creator , Tool , Merge , Watermark $1.98 -> $0.99
Rima: The Story Begins - Adventure Game $4.49 -> $2.24
